remarks: A nonzero poset element less than or equal to an atom equals the atom. (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-2013.)
statement:
leatom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
leatom.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
leatom.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
leatom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
leat2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) /\ ( X =/= .0. /\ X .<_ P ) ) -> X = P ) $.
